fields.description:
NOTE *Nexus7(2) only*
While testing Image View Positioning on Nexus7(2), I encountered the issue when an image is not displayed in the view.

Test steps:
1. Install and run KS> Base UI> Views> Image Views> Image View Positioning

Expected result:
Image should be at top 10 and left 1

Actual result:
No image
fields.summary: Android 4.3: Image View Positioning - the image is not displayed in the view on Nexus 7(2)
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.2.201307261628
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.2.v20130730133101
Devices:
Nexus7(2)
Nexus4
Android version 4.3
KitchenSink latest commit e4f5f195722b5f53f8927018d75d35777317b638

comments.body: I can't reproduce this behavior on the 4.3 Nexus.

Discovered the KS with the different GUID: ca640fdf-4db1-4853-a2be-1b661038c84 was tested instead GUID:28a706e9-4130-4acb-bc76-9494255a9279. 
I am not sure of cause of the different GUID.
Cannot reproduce with:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.2.201307261628
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.2.v20130801190110
Devices:
Nexus7(2)
Nexus4
Android version 4.3
